snippet: The Lance Armstrong report didn’t explain the seductive power of the blood booster he used or how health care providers and our culture pushed its irresponsible use.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Kathleen Sharp contends furor over Lance Armstrong blood-doping scandal ignores role played by health care providers and culture in encouraging irresponsible use of erythropoietin, hormone that stimulates production of red blood cells.
lead_paragraph: The Lance Armstrong report didn’t explain the seductive power of the blood booster he used or how health care providers and our culture pushed its irresponsible use.

headline.main: A Drug to Quicken the Blood
